DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two slightly different method transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) treat Post Traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD )
DOC.brief_title: High-Frequency Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Right Dorsolateral Prefrontal Cortex PTSD
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize single-blind pilot study investigate efficacy high-frequency repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) apply right dorsolateral prefrontal cortex either 10 Hz 20 Hz compare treatment usual group treatment Post Traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) symptom .
